name: Golem that Guards the Millennium Treasures
text: The activation of your "Millennium Cross" cannot be negated. You can only use each of the following effects of "Golem that Guards the Millennium Treasures" once per turn. If this card is in your hand: You can place it face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. If this card is a Continuous Spell: You can pay 2000 LP or reveal 1 "Millennium Cross" in your hand; Special Summon this card, then you can add 1 "Shrine of Wedju" from your Deck to your hand.
